Title: The effect of viewpoint dependence in spatial memory tasks on intrusive memories in analogue trauma

ResultSummary: No group difference on initial intrusion (Image) between shifted-view and control group

Title: The effect of viewpoint dependence in spatial memory tasks on intrusive memories in analogue trauma

Title: Refraining from intrusive thoughts is strategy dependent: a comment on sugiura, et al. and a preliminary informal test of detached mindfulness, acceptance, and other strategies
